          <title>
            <string language="en">Silicate sheets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kieselsäureverbindungblätter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuilles de silicate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folhas do silicato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fogli del silicato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλα πυριτικών αλάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hojas del silicato</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates the formation of silicate sheets by the sharing of the three corners of the silicate ions with other silicate ions.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">layered structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sharing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">silicate ions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">silicate sheets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tetrahedra</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Anordnung der 
Kieselsäureverbindungblätter durch das Teilen der drei Ecken der 
Kieselsäureverbindungionen mit anderen Kieselsäureverbindungionen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre la formation des 
feuilles de silicate par le partage des trois coins des ions de 
silicate avec d'autres ions de silicate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra a formação de folhas
do silicato compartilhar dos três cantos dos íons do silicato com 
outros íons do silicato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra la formazione dei 
fogli del silicato dalla compartecipazione dei tre angoli degli ioni 
del silicato con altri ioni del silicato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει το σχηματισμό των 
φύλλων πυριτικών αλάτων με τη διανομή των τριών γωνιών των 
ιόντων πυριτικών αλάτων με άλλα ιόντα πυριτικών αλάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra la formación de las 
hojas del silicato por compartir de las tres esquinas de los iones del
silicato con otros iones del silicato.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">überlagerte Struktur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
